TopicTitle: KSP mentioned at Asteroid Initiative Workshop

Articles.Content:
I thought this was cool and wanted to share this everyone here. I've been watching these videos of the Asteroid Initiative Workshop while playing KSP and got really excited when I heard KSP mentioned in a question by a person in the audience! And his idea sounded really cool as well. This part of the video was about getting the public involved and informed about asteroids and their threat to Earth.

http://youtu.be/fbrE_vBTeXo?t=16m19s (this link will take you to that point in the video)

I wonder if anyone at Squad has been contacted about a partnership like that yet.
